div.div: at Waterville, ME | Harold Alfond Stad.

tr.td: Colby wins the toss. Elects to defer. Amherst will receive.
D. Bendit kickoff 70 yards to the AMH0, touchback.
B. Grauer pass complete to B. Kettering for 3 yards to the AMH23 (R. Veillette).
E. Bunker rush for 3 yards to the AMH26 (B. Mellett).
